system.description:
Effect: This action can only be taken while you have the @Affliction[grapple] Affliction. Pick one of the following 3 effects:
- If you are in control of the Grapple, make a Lift check, it gains a Challenge Rating based on the difference in Weight Classes between you, your allies and your target(s), calculated as: (userCatMod-targetCatMod)/2. On success, you may use Breaking Hold on any number of foes in the Grapple, on a failure nothing happens, but you stay in control of the Grapple.
- If you are in control of the Grapple, you use this Action to escape the Grapple.
- If you are not in control of the Grapple, you may make Lift Check (same rules as above) to break free or take control of the Grapple. If you succeed, you choose to escape the Grapple or take control of the Grapple.
